article.ttl: change of basic tone, overtone? or modulation?
article.dsc:
In the change of the basic tone, many of us commonly refer to it as overtune, while behind this term, there is a different explanation and actual meaning in the world of music. Here is the explanation.

This time, let's discuss a bit about overtune. In the music world, an overtune is the opening or special introduction in a musical work. Serving as a gateway, it prepares the listener emotionally by introducing main motifs, themes, or musical characteristics that will be heard throughout the piece. Although initially associated with opera and classical music, the concept of overtune has evolved and been adopted in various music genres, offering a deeper and more satisfying listening experience.

On the other hand, with modulation, modulation in the music world is a technique that involves changing the key or tonality in a musical composition. The key is a set of notes that form the basis of a song, and modulation refers to the subtle or dramatic shift from one key to another. This technique provides rich nuances and variations in music, creating emotional or dramatic changes that enrich the listener's experience. Modulation can be used to create tension, build excitement, or convey deep emotional changes in a musical composition, making it an essential element in the art of music.

Additionally, I gained this understanding from a video snippet uploaded by the VokalPlus channel, explained by Mr. Indra Aziz as shown below.

So, what do you think? Is the correct term for the change of the basic tone overtune or modulation? Now that we know the meanings of these two terms, which are far different from what we initially understood, I hope this article is helpful. Happy reading :)

This is a monitor in the entry-level class, equipped with common features found in many other entry-level monitors of different brands or series. Among its features are an IPS panel, a 24-inch display with a FHD 1920 x 1080 resolution, and a 75Hz refresh rate. This monitor was released in 2019. Below, I also provide the best settings for this monitor as follows:

  • bright = custom
  • brightness = 81
  • contrast = 75
  • eye saver mode = off
  • eco saving plus = off
  • gamma = gamma 1
  • color tone = custom
  • red = 44
  • green = 42
  • blue = 45

Model code = LS24R350FZEXXD

Model = S24R350FZE

With the above settings, this monitor will deliver its best display. From the specifications and setup tips I shared above, and the rest of the information, I obtained from a video uploaded and discussed by the GTID YouTube channel. Here's a snippet:

I hope this article is helpful, and thank you for stopping by. Have a nice day :)

Infinityfree is one of the hosting services that provides free accounts for users, including a free domain name and database. Not only that, Infinityfree also offers SMTP feature in its free service. From my experience, at the end of 2021, I created an account for 0 rupiah, meaning it was free, which I used to host a project form that also utilized the SMTP feature, and it ran smoothly.

After leaving the project at the end of 2021, a few days ago, I remembered this project. When I tried to access it, it turned out to still be usable, although I didn't check the SMTP feature in-depth. This means that the free account usage period on this hosting service seems to be very long.

In this article, I might want to recommend this hosting service for you free enthusiasts. It's also suitable for those who want to learn about hosting and more because I am still learning myself. Below, I have included the link to Infinityfree, click here. Thank you for visiting, and I hope this article is useful. Have a nice day :)
